name: Slime
description: Jelly-like enemy. Takes hits well, but not dangerous alone.

name: Goblin
description: A quick little nuisance with a nasty grin.

name: Goblin Shaman
description: Casts weak spells, but can surprise the unprepared.

name: Orc Grunt
description: Strong and simple. Swings hard, thinks slow.

name: Orc Warrior
description: A brutal orc fighter, stronger than the average brute.

name: Orc Commander
description: Leads with brute force and battle fury.

name: Lizard
description: A large, scaly beast. Tough and dangerous.

name: Lizard Bow
description: A lizardman archer, quick and deadly from a distance.

name: Lizard Leader
description: The leader of the lizardmen, commanding and fierce.

name: Skeleton
description: An animated skeleton, relentless and unyielding.

name: Skeleton Ranger
description: A skeleton archer, deadly from afar with its bow.

name: Reaper
description: A terrifying specter, wielding a scythe and draining life from its foes.
